items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: March of the Legion
explicitMods: +5 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 25 Divine Blessing
flavourText: When the time comes to face evil, the faithful are never alone.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants evasion to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2700 additional Evasion Rating
You and nearby allies gain 30% more Evasion rating
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with a duration.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 20% reduced Mana Cost
Supported Skills have 20% reduced Life Cost
Supported Skills have 54% increased Skill Effect Duration
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill. Minions, Totems, Traps and Mines cannot gain Inspiration Charges.
explicitMods: Supported Skills have 34% reduced Mana Cost

Gain an Inspiration Charge when you Spend Mana on Upfront
Costs or Effects of Supported Skills
Lose all Inspiration Charges after Spending a total of 730 Mana on Upfront Costs and Effects of Supported Skills
Supported Skills deal 5% more Elemental Damage per Inspiration Charge
Supported Skills have 8% increased Critical Strike Chance per Inspiration Charge
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the level of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.

socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Kaom's Spirit
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed AoE Gems
explicitMods: 0.5% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
Life Recovery from Regeneration is not applied
Regenerate 1 Rage per second for every 100 Life Recovery per second from Regeneration
flavourText: Who can tell when whispers are truly from a god?

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that adds lightning damage to the attacks of you and your allies, and makes your spells deal more lightning damage.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies deal 16 to 248 additional Lightning Damage with Attacks
You and nearby allies deal 21% more Spell Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Cast Speed
You and nearby allies gain 25% increased Attack Speed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants armour to you and your allies.
explicitMods: You and nearby allies gain 2153 additional Armour

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Replica Dreamfeather
enchantMods: Quality does not increase Physical Damage
flavourText: "Once we armoured the test subject heavily enough to test Prototype #502, he proceeded
to fight his way out. I don't know what we expected."
- Researcher Graven

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summons an Ancestor Totem which attacks enemies with melee strikes while you're near it. Being near it grants you more attack speed. Requires a Melee Weapon or Unarmed.
explicitMods: Summons a Totem which uses this Skill
20% more Attack Speed while Totem is Active
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Storm Suit
implicitMods: 20% increased effect of Non-Curse Auras from your Skills
craftedMods: 6% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Fire Damage
6% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Lightning Damage
fracturedMods: Armour is increased by Overcapped Fire Resistance
flavourText: Of ash and avalanche,
in storm and flesh,
we dream of unity.
The time approaches...

properties.name: Lightning, Attack, AoE, Duration, Melee, Strike, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Performs a melee attack, and causes lightning to strike a targeted location or nearby enemy, dealing damage in an area. Each target can only be hit once by this skill. Hitting an enemy grants an aura, giving you and your allies additional lightning damage for a duration. Requires a Sword, Axe, Mace, Sceptre, Staff or Unarmed.
explicitMods: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Aura grants 13 to 239 added Lightning Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports attack skills.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 60% more Maximum Attack Damage
Supported Skills deal 70% less Minimum Attack Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 7% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25

explicitMods: 48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies

so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Aura Gems

You will be repaid.
